meta.title: World 4: Data Structures I - Quiz
meta.intro: Test your knowledge of strings, lists, tuples, sets, and dictionaries.

strings.question: Strings are enclosed only with double quotes.

lists.question: Lists can be changed after creation.
Fill the blank: nums = [1, 2, 3]; nums.___(4) adds 4.

tuples.question: Tuples can be modified after creation.

sets.question: A set keeps items in order.

dicts.question: How do you get the value of key 'age'?

final_quiz.question: Dictionary values are accessed using their ___

puzzle.title: Phonebook Fix
puzzle.description: Fix this program so it stores and prints a phone number correctly.
